name: Andromeda 3035
description:
A shoot 'em up game inspired by arcade classics like Galaga or Space Invaders.
Fight against endless waves of alien spaceships and see how long you'll last!

Story:
It's the year 3035 and humans are beginning to colonise the Andromeda galaxy for resources and to find a place to live. It's your job to defend the colonists against hostile aliens. The fate of mankind depends on you!

Assets used:
Music: https://gamesupply.itch.io/ultimate-space-game-mega-asset-package
Font: https://managore.itch.io/m5x7
Rest of the assets were made by me.
